title: New releases: Dala, Richmond, & Textur
content:
[Linotype Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.fontexplorer.com/FontStore/) releases Bo Berndal's [Dala](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dala-lt/text/), Richard Yeend's [Richmond Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/richmond-fraktur-lt/dfr/) & [Zierschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/richmond-zierschrift-lt/dfr/), and Roland Goulsbra's [Textur Gotisch](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/textur-gotisch-lt/dfr/) & [Lombardisch](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/textur-lombardisch-lt/dfr/).   
   
Dala includes two extra fonts of [borders](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dala-lt/borders/charmap.html) and [vignettes](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dala-lt/pict/charmap.html). The other fonts contain expert and alternate characters... Textur Gotisch even includes a half-r.   
   
Yeend also designed the slanting [Buckingham Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/buckingham-fraktur-lt/dfr/) with some nice [alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20140808115750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/buckingham-fraktur-lt/alternate/charmap.html).
author: johnbutler
